mapper.select: SELECT iam_user.id FROM iam_user INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT imr.member_id FROM fd_project_permission fpu INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON fpu.MEMBER_ROLE_ID = imr.id WHERE fpu.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} ) t ON iam_user.id = t.member_id

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM fd_project fp INNER JOIN fd_project_permission fpu ON fpu.project_id = fp.id INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON fpu.MEMBER_ROLE_ID = imr.id LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant fo ON fp.organization_id = fo.tenant_id WHERE imr.member_id = #{id}
AND ( fp.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR fp.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )

SELECT fp.id, fp.name, fp.code, fp.organization_id, fo.tenant_name AS organization_name, fo.tenant_num AS organization_code, fp.is_enabled, ir.id AS role_id, ir.name AS role_name, ir.code AS role_code, ir.is_enabled AS role_is_enabled, ir.h_tenant_id as role_org_id, ir.object_version_number as role_version_number, ir.created_by as role_created_by, ir.creation_date as role_creation_date FROM fd_project fp INNER JOIN fd_project_permission fpu ON fpu.project_id = fp.id INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON fpu.MEMBER_ROLE_ID = imr.id LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant fo ON fp.organization_id = fo.tenant_id WHERE imr.member_id = #{id}
AND ( fp.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR fp.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )
SELECT is_enabled FROM fd_project WHERE id = #{sourceId}

select fp.*, fpc.id as category_id, fpc.code as category_code, fpc.name as category_name from fd_project fp left join fd_project_map_category fpmc ON fpmc.PROJECT_ID = fp.id left join fd_project_category fpc ON fpc.id =fpmc.CATEGORY_ID where fp.id in
#{id}
SELECT NAME FROM fd_project WHERE TYPE = #{type} AND organization_id = #{orgId}
SELECT NAME FROM fd_project WHERE TYPE IS NULL AND organization_id = #{orgId};

select fp.*, fpc.id as category_id, fpc.name as category_name, fpc.code as category_code, fpc.object_version_number as category_version_number, fpc.organization_id as category_org_id from fd_project fp left join fd_project_map_category fpmc on fp.id = fpmc.project_id left join fd_project_category fpc on fpc.id = fpmc.category_id Where fp.id = #{projectId} order by fpmc.id asc

select * from fd_project fp WHERE fp.organization_id=#{organizationId} AND fp.is_enabled=1
AND ( fp.name like concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') )
select p.id as projectId, pc.id as categoryId from fd_project p left join FD_PROJECT_CATEGORY pc on p.CATEGORY=pc.CODE

SELECT fp.id FROM fd_project fp left join iam_user iu on iu.id = fp.created_by
INNER JOIN fd_project_permission fpu ON fpu.PROJECT_ID = fp.id INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.id = fpu.MEMBER_ROLE_ID INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON (ir.is_enabled = 1 and ir.id = imr.role_id)
LEFT JOIN fd_project_permission fpu ON fpu.PROJECT_ID = fp.id LEFT JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.id = fpu.MEMBER_ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON (ir.is_enabled = 1 and ir.id = imr.role_id)
fp.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND fp.is_enabled = 1
AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.source_id = #{organizationId}
GROUP BY fp.id

SELECT DISTINCT fp.*, fpc.id as category_id, fpc.name as category_name, fpc.code as category_code, fpc.object_version_number as category_version_number, fpc.organization_id as category_org_id FROM fd_project fp inner join fd_project_map_category fpmc on fp.id = fpmc.project_id inner join fd_project_category fpc on (fpc.id = fpmc.category_id and (fpc.code = 'AGILE' or fpc.code = 'GENERAL' or fpc.code='PROGRAM'))
INNER JOIN fd_project_permission fpu ON fpu.PROJECT_ID = fp.id INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.id = fpu.MEMBER_ROLE_ID INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON (ir.is_enabled = 1 and ir.id = imr.role_id)
AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND imr.member_type = 'user'
AND fp.is_enabled = #{projectDTO.enabled}

select fp.* from fd_project fp where fp.organization_id = #{organizationId}
AND fp.name like concat(concat('%',#{projectDTO.name}),'%')
AND fp.code like concat(concat('%',#{projectDTO.code}),'%')
AND fp.is_enabled = #{projectDTO.enabled}
AND ( fp.name like concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR fp.code like concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )
order by
${orderBy},
fp.id desc

select fp.id from fd_project fp WHERE 1=1
AND fp.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')

SELECT fpu.PROJECT_ID FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.id = imr.role_id INNER JOIN hiam_label_rel hlr on (hlr.data_type = #{roleLabelDataType} AND hlr.data_id = ir.id) INNER JOIN iam_label il ON il.id = hlr.label_id INNER JOIN fd_project_permission fpu ON fpu.MEMBER_ROLE_ID = imr.id
imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.source_id = #{organizationId} AND il.name = 'PROJECT_ADMIN'

SELECT fpmc.*, fpc.name AS category_name, fpc.CODE AS category_code FROM fd_project_map_category fpmc INNER JOIN fd_project_category fpc ON fpc.ID = fpmc.CATEGORY_ID WHERE fpmc.PROJECT_ID IN
#{pid}

SELECT fp.* FROM fd_project fp
INNER JOIN fd_project_permission fpu ON fpu.PROJECT_ID = fp.id INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.id = fpu.MEMBER_ROLE_ID INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON (ir.is_enabled = 1 and ir.id = imr.role_id)
LEFT JOIN fd_project_permission fpu ON fpu.PROJECT_ID = fp.id LEFT JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.id = fpu.MEMBER_ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON (ir.is_enabled = 1 and ir.id = imr.role_id)
fp.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND fp.is_enabled = true
AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.source_id = #{organizationId}
GROUP BY fp.id

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fd_project_permission fpp JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.id = fpp.MEMBER_ROLE_ID AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_id = #{organizationId} AND imr.source_type = 'organization' JOIN fd_project fp ON fp.ID = fpp.PROJECT_ID AND fp.IS_ENABLED = 1 WHERE fpp.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
SELECT fdc.`CODE` FROM fd_project_map_category fpmc LEFT JOIN fd_project_category fdc ON fdc.id = fpmc.CATEGORY_ID WHERE fpmc.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
